name: WORDLOS
description:
WORDLOS is a clone of the neo classic word game for DOS. 

It's written in x86 16bit mode assembly and runs on MS-DOS, DosBox or FreeDOS. The HTML version is overengineered and it runs on an wasm compiled version of DosBox (js-dos), the output is rendered with a simple post-processing shader with ThreeJS.

Useful links
  • WORDLOS Source: https://github.com/CrociDB/wordlos
  • More info & game running on another js emulator: https://crocidb.github.io/wordlos/
  • Launcher for this HTML5 version: https://github.com/CrociDB/dosgame-web-launcher
